effect: Lowers the evasion of all opposing Pokémon by 1 stage when the Pokémon enters the battle.
synergies: Pokémon that benefit from hitting opponents more reliably
notes: Unique to the Dipplin evolutionary line; the evasion drop occurs even if the opponent has a substitute, but does not affect Pokémon with the abilities Clear Body, White Smoke, or protected by Mist.
